# BioSUPERCAP

*Research project on development of energy storage devices powered by living electroactive bacteria*

---

## Objectives

- Develop advanced bio-electrochemical energy storage systems
- Investigate living electroactive bacteria for sustainable energy applications
- Integrate multi-disciplinary approaches from microbiology, materials science, and electrochemistry

---

## Project Overview

The BioSUPERCAP project aims to create innovative energy storage devices that harness the natural capabilities of electroactive bacteria. Our research combines experimental studies, computational modeling, and prototype development.
